name: MvPolynomial.continuous_eval
initialProofState:
X : Type u_1
σ : Type u_2
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace X
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring X
inst✝ : TopologicalSemiring X
p : MvPolynomial σ X
⊢ Continuous fun x => (MvPolynomial.eval x) p
decl:
theorem MvPolynomial.continuous_eval : Continuous fun x ↦ eval x p := by
